Title: The Gum
Plot: Kramer is active in the re-opening of an old movie theater. He also is keeping an eye on a friend, Lloyd, who's recovering from a nervous breakdown. Lloyd has a pack of Chinese gum that Kramer insists everyone tries. George thinks the cashier short-changed him and meets a former neighbor (who's had a breakdown) and his daughter, Deena. George lets his former neighbor look at his car. Elaine tries to avoid interacting with Lloyd, loses a button from her blouse and reveals herself to Lloyd and Kra
GuestStars: Larry David, Matt McCoy, Mary Jo Keenen, Eric Christmas, Sandy Ward, Ruth Cohen, Lionel Mark Smith, Vito D'Ambrosio, Alan Watt
